entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
